onyomiExamples.meaning: a little over, a little more than, powerhouse, one of the biggest, one of the most powerful
major powers of the world, great powers

kunyomiExamples.meaning: strong, potent, competent, domineering, tough, strong, brawny, powerful, healthy, rugged, good (at), skilled, knowledgeable, being able to handle, know how to deal (with), durable (against), resistant (to), resilient, firm, rigid, solid, intense, strong, fierce, high, dependable, trustworthy
to get strong, to gain strength
to strengthen, to emphasize, to emphasise
to force, to compel, to coerce, to press, to impose
tough, stiff, hard, inflexible, obstinate, stubborn, tired, worn out
glutinous rice with red beans (eaten on celebratory occasions), mochi rice with red beans
